alert.note: Alert for Arkansas; Jefferson; Lincoln (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 05 at 2:27PM CDT until May 05 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN JEFFERSON...NORTHEASTERN LINCOLN AND CENTRAL ARKANSAS COUNTIES... At 227 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Little Bayou Meto Park, or 18 miles north of Dumas, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Gillett... Douglas... Little Bayou Meto Park... Merrisach Lake... De Witt... Langford... Arkansas Post... De Luce... Reydell... Tichnor... Bayou Meteo State Game Area... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
